channel.title: embedded on Michael's Blag
channel.description: Recent content in embedded on Michael's Blag

item.title: Hello, blog
item.description: I’ve had a Wordpress blog for about as long as I’ve had a domain. It was appropriate in 2012, sure, but I like to think that I’m smarter and wiser now, and if I have a Wordpress blog, then I’d be a hypocrite if I made fun of it. To allow myself some additional liberties, it’s finally (way past) time for WP to die! “But why”, I hear you cry, “do you need a blog at all?
